timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
{fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
     | rate
     | every 1m
     | align next_older(2m);
    metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
     | align next_older(2m)
  }
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| outer_join 0
| div;
fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time
     | rate
     | every 1m
     | align next_older(2m);
    metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores
     | align next_older(2m)
  }
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| outer_join 0
| div
} | union
| top 5 
| scale "%"

{ fetch k8s_container
| metric kubernetes.io/container/restart_count
| align delta(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum();
fetch k8s_container
| metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/restart_count
| align delta(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
} | union
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| metric logging.googleapis.com/log_entry_count
| filter metric.severity =~ "ERROR|CRITICAL|ALERT|EMERGENCY"
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| top 5

fetch monitoring.googleapis.com/MetricIngestionAttribution
| metric monitoring.googleapis.com/collection/attribution/write_sample_count
| filter metric.metric_domain == "prometheus.googleapis.com"
| filter metric.resource_type == "prometheus_target"
| filter resource.attribution_dimension == "cluster"
| group_by [resource.attribution_id, resource.location], .sum()
| align rate(1m)
| top 5

fetch k8s_pod
| metric logging.googleapis.com/log_entry_count
| filter metric.log == "events"
| filter metric.severity =~ "WARNING|ERROR|CRITICAL|ALERT|EMERGENCY"
| align delta(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| top 5
